meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being malty.
meanings.sent1: I love the rich maltiness of the bread my grandma bakes.
meanings.sent2: The beer had a strong maltiness that lingered on my tongue.
meanings.sent3: The maltiness of the cereal made it taste like a cozy morning.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a comforting maltiness, like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The maltiness of the chocolate brought back memories of childhood treats.

meanings.definition: The flavor or taste of malt.
meanings.sent1: The maltiness of the milkshake was delightful.
meanings.sent2: I could detect a hint of maltiness in the cookies.
meanings.sent3: The maltiness of the soup surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a sweet maltiness that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The maltiness of the tea was soothing after a long day.

meanings.definition: The presence of malt in a substance.
meanings.sent1: The maltiness in the drink gave it a unique twist.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the maltiness in the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The maltiness in the air hinted at the nearby brewery.
meanings.sent4: The maltiness in the atmosphere made me crave a cold beer.
meanings.sent5: The maltiness in the soil enriched the flavor of the crops.
